SEARCH
Package Persistence

Class FilePersistenceManager

java.lang.Object
Persistence.FilePersistenceManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
PersistenceManager
public class FilePersistenceManager extends Object implements PersistenceManager
Manages reading from and writing to files for entities like Nutzer, Artikel, and Event.

    • aendereArtikelInDatei

      public boolean aendereArtikelInDatei(int artikelnummer, int neuerBestand)
      Changes the stock of an article in the file.
      Parameters:
      artikelnummer - The article number of the article whose stock is to be changed.
      neuerBestand - The new stock quantity to be set for the article.
      Returns:
      True if the stock change operation was successful, false otherwise.
